samples.instruction: Consumer forum order implement aagala - enna seivathu?
samples.current_output: Execution petition file pannunga. Order implement seyyaadha party-kku: 1) Fine, 2) Imprisonment (up to 3 years), 3) Property attachment. Forum-kke execution petition podunga. District Collector moolamum execution nadakkum.

samples.current_output: Corporation/Municipality nilai poruthadhu. Complaint: Corporation + Animal Welfare Board. Compensation: Civil Court suit against local body (negligence). Medical expenses claim. ABC (Animal Birth Control) program failure prove pannanum. Police complaint-um possible.

samples.instruction: Eviction notice vandhaal ethanai naal time kidaikkum?
samples.current_output: Agreement-la mention seidha notice period (1-3 months) kidaikkum. Court through eviction na reasonable time koduppaanga. Rent default case-la 15 days notice koduthu arrears pay seiyya chance tharuvaanga.

samples.instruction: Online order varavilla - refund eppadi peruvathu?
samples.current_output: Steps: 1) Website/App-la refund request raise pannunga, 2) Email-la written complaint anuppunga, 3) Payment bank-kku chargeback request kodunga (credit card), 4) Response illaattal NCH (1800-11-4000) complaint, 5) Consumer forum case podunga. E-commerce company 5-7 days-la acknowledge seyyanum.

samples.instruction: DV case-la enna relief kidaikkum?
samples.current_output: Reliefs under DV Act: 1) Protection order (abuse stop), 2) Residence order (shared household-la stay), 3) Monetary relief (maintenance, medical, compensation), 4) Custody order, 5) Compensation. Ex-parte order (urgent) 2-3 days-la kidaikkum.

samples.instruction: Tenant union form pannalaamaa? Collective bargaining legal-aa?
samples.current_output: Legal! Tenant associations/unions form pannalam. Benefits: 1) Collective voice against unfair practices, 2) Negotiate with owner associations, 3) Legal aid pooling, 4) Information sharing. Registration: Societies Registration Act-in keezh. Apartment complexes: Resident Welfare Association (RWA) common. Protect yourselves through unity.

samples.instruction: Pollution complaint enge koduppadhu?
samples.current_output: TNPCB (Tamil Nadu Pollution Control Board): tnpcb.gov.in. NGT (National Green Tribunal): Chennai bench. District Environment Engineer. Complaint types: Air, water, noise, hazardous waste. Evidence: Photos, videos, test reports. Public interest litigation-um possible.

samples.instruction: Appointment letter kodukkala - sattavirodhamaa?
samples.current_output: Aama. Written employment contract kodukkanum. Appointment letter contents: Designation, salary, probation period, notice period, duties. Oral appointment-um valid aanaal prove panradhu kashtam. Always insist on written letter + copy vaangunga.

samples.instruction: Yearly evvalavu percentage rent increase niyaayamanadhu?
samples.current_output: Sattathula fixed percentage illa. Practice-la 5-10% yearly increase normal. But market rate, inflation, property value increase ivai consider aagum. Unreasonable increase-a Rent Authority moolam dispute seyyalam.

samples.instruction: Adoption-à®•à¯à®•à¯ eligibility criteria à®à®©à¯à®©?
samples.current_output: CARA rules: 1) Age: 25-55 years, 2) Married couple: 2 years stable marriage, 3) Single parent: allowed (restrictions apply), 4) Income: sufficient to raise child, 5) Medical: physically/mentally fit, 6) No criminal record. Age difference with child: max 45 years.

samples.instruction: Rental agreement kattaayama?
samples.current_output: Aama, 2017 Act padiye kattaayam. Written agreement illaattal problem varum. 11 months-kku mela irundhaal Registration kattaayam. Stamp paper-la ezhudhi Sub-Registrar office-la register seiyya venum.

samples.instruction: Motor Accident Claim eppadi file seivathu?
samples.current_output: File at: Motor Accident Claims Tribunal (MACT) - District Court. Documents: FIR, medical records, bills, death certificate (if applicable), income proof, insurance details. Time limit: No strict limit (reasonable time). Lawyer not mandatory. Lok Adalat-lum settle aagalam.

samples.instruction: Arrest aagum bodhu enna rights irukku?
samples.current_output: Constitutional rights: 1) Arrest reason therivikkanum, 2) Lawyer azhaikka right, 3) Family-kku inform seyya, 4) 24 hours-la Magistrate mun aajar, 5) Medical examination, 6) Silent remain seyya right. Women: Only women police, not between sunset-sunrise.
